origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenFinanceAPI.get_policy_support', 'description': 'This function provides policy support details for a specific green financial product.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'productType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of green financial product for which policy support is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policySupport', 'description': 'Details of policy support for the specified green financial product.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenFinanceAPI.get_policy_support, 它的参数输入如下: 'productType'是'green_bonds'.
